title: Publish readiness: fix footer copyright and add deployment instructions

requirements.text: Update the site footer copyright line to display the exact text "© 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad" (not a dynamic year) to match the portfolio requirements before publishing.
acceptanceCriteria: The year is not derived from the current date
No other footer content is unintentionally removed or broken (social links still work)

requirements.text: Add a repo-level publishing/deployment guide (e.g., DEPLOYMENT.md) that documents the steps to build and deploy the app to the Internet Computer using the existing project setup (frontend + single Motoko canister).
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment documentation file exists in the repository
The guide includes clear build and deploy commands and prerequisite steps (e.g., installing dependencies, starting dfx, deploying)
Instructions are written in English and are specific enough for a developer to follow without additional context

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not modify frontend immutable hook/bootstrap paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add migration.mo only if state upgrades are required.
nonGoals: Adding new portfolio sections or new pages as part of publishing.
Introducing external services (email providers, third-party auth, external databases).
Changing the site’s overall visual theme beyond what is required to correct the footer copyright text.
